TestInformation.Title: POV-Ray
TestInformation.Description: This is a test of POV-Ray, the Persistence of Vision Raytracer. POV-Ray is used to create 3D graphics using ray-tracing. This system/povray test profile relies on the OS provided POV-Ray (povray) package as opposed to the existing pts/povray test profile that builds the same version of POV-Ray from the upstream source code.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Trace Time
